description:
The dark warriors have figured out that Pollun holds the power of the stones, so they set out to capture him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Pits! Has the Power of the Stones Been Stolen
Saiaku! Ishi no Chikara ga Ubawareta!?
วิกฤต พลังของหินถูกชิงไปแล้ว
サイアク~! 石の力が奪われた~!?
